Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields

  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestCase
    Write junit4 unit tests using HBaseTestingUtility
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.SecureBulkLoadEndpointClient
    Use for backward compatibility testing only. Will be removed when SecureBulkLoadEndpoint is not supported.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.codec.CodecPerformance.LOG
    LOG variable would be made private. since 1.2, remove in 3.0
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.TEST_DIRECTORY_KEY
    can be used only with mini dfs
